00027 /*
00028  * This file is part of Lustre, http://www.lustre.org/
00029  *
00030  * Author: Nathan Rutman <nathan.rutman@seagate.com>
00031  *
00032  * Kernel <-> userspace communication routines.
00033  * The definitions below are used in the kernel and userspace.
00034  */
00035 
00036 #ifndef __UAPI_KERNELCOMM_H__
00037 #define __UAPI_KERNELCOMM_H__
00038 
00039 #include <linux/types.h>
00040 
00041 /* KUC message header.
00042  * All current and future KUC messages should use this header.
00043  * To avoid having to include Lustre headers from libcfs, define this here.
00044  */
00045 struct kuc_hdr {
00046         __u16 kuc_magic;
00047         __u8  kuc_transport;  /* Each new Lustre feature should use a different
00048                                  transport */
00049         __u8  kuc_flags;
00050         __u16 kuc_msgtype;    /* Message type or opcode, transport-specific */
00051         __u16 kuc_msglen;     /* Including header */
00052 } __attribute__((aligned(sizeof(__u64))));
00053 
00054 #define KUC_CHANGELOG_MSG_MAXSIZE (sizeof(struct kuc_hdr)+CR_MAXSIZE)
00055 
00056 #define KUC_MAGIC  0x191C /*Lustre9etLinC */
00057 
00058 /* kuc_msgtype values are defined in each transport */
00059 enum kuc_transport_type {
00060         KUC_TRANSPORT_GENERIC   = 1,
00061         KUC_TRANSPORT_HSM       = 2,
00062         KUC_TRANSPORT_CHANGELOG = 3,
00063 };
00064 
00065 enum kuc_generic_message_type {
00066         KUC_MSG_SHUTDOWN = 1,
00067 };
00068 
00069 /* KUC Broadcast Groups. This determines which userspace process hears which
00070  * messages.  Mutliple transports may be used within a group, or multiple
00071  * groups may use the same transport.  Broadcast
00072  * groups need not be used if e.g. a UID is specified instead;
00073  * use group 0 to signify unicast.
00074  */
00075 #define KUC_GRP_HSM     0x02
00076 #define KUC_GRP_MAX     KUC_GRP_HSM
00077 
00078 #define LK_FLG_STOP 0x01
00079 #define LK_NOFD -1U
00080 
00081 /* kernelcomm control structure, passed from userspace to kernel */
00082 struct lustre_kernelcomm {
00083         __u32 lk_wfd;
00084         __u32 lk_rfd;
00085         __u32 lk_uid;
00086         __u32 lk_group;
00087         __u32 lk_data;
00088         __u32 lk_flags;
00089 } __attribute__((packed));
00090 
00091 #endif  /* __UAPI_KERNELCOMM_H__ */
